pages.title: Layered Safety
pages.text: Use segmented rooms instead of one large hall. Keep core storage behind two controlled chokepoints. Label critical chests by function so misplaced items are immediately visible.

pages.title: Fallback Caches
pages.text: Hide three micro-caches: food + tools, armor + weapon, and navigation supplies. Place each in different directions from spawn. If your main base is compromised, momentum is survival.
